https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/61HDUsItzTEonRnDGdKmDE99vSq.jpg Spoiled single girl Angie Moore gets cut off 25 days before Christmas. When she discovers the existence of a sizable trust fund that she will inherit once she gets married, Angie decides to find a man to marry - by Christmas. A Ring for Christmas
